name: Modules.Nfc.TagTechnologyNdef
summary: Provides access to NDEF content and operations on a Modules.Nfc.NfcTag.

methods.name: canMakeReadOnly
methods.summary: Indicates whether a tag can be made read-only with makeReadOnly.

returns.summary: true if it is possible to make this tag read-only.

methods.name: getCachedNdefMessage
methods.summary: Get the Modules.Nfc.NdefMessage that was read from the tag at discovery time.

returns.summary: NDEF Message read from the tag at discovery time, can be null.

methods.name: getMaxSize
methods.summary: Get the maximum NDEF message size in bytes.

methods.name: getType
methods.description: One of TAG_TYPE_NFC_FORUM_TYPE_1, TAG_TYPE_NFC_FORUM_TYPE_2, TAG_TYPE_NFC_FORUM_TYPE_3, TAG_TYPE_NFC_FORUM_TYPE_4, TAG_TYPE_MIFARE_CLASSIC, or another NDEF tag type that has not yet been formalized in the Android API.

returns.summary: true on success, false if it is not possible to make this tag read-only.
